overview: Magellan is an unfinished cycle of films by Hollis Frampton, to be shown over 371 days (the Magellan Calendar). STRAITS OF MAGELLAN was one of three phases of the calendar, and Pans are one-minute films interspersed throughout this phase. Comprised of Pan 0, Pan 1 (both from 1974), Pan 2 (1970), Pan 3 (1972), Pan 4, Pan 697, Pan 698, Pan 699 (all from 1974) and Pan 700 (1969).
title: Straits of Magellan: Pans 0–4 and 697–700
